restaurant.name: Alchemy
restaurant.description: Alchemy is dedicated to providing a transformative experience through nourishing food, rejuvenating practices, and a nurturing environment. We guide individuals towards their highest potential and well-being, benefiting both themselves and the community around them. Our vision is to cultivate a community that is deeply connected to the wisdom of nature - where individuals find healing, health, purpose, and joy through conscious choices and nourishing experiences.
restaurant.notes: Our menu is fully plant-based and mostly gluten free. Some dishes are raw (not heated above 43°C / 110°F). All prices are subject to 6% service charge and 10% government tax.

items.title: Turmeric Laksa
items.description: Creamy coconut, ginger, chili broth with veggie noodles, spinach, mushrooms & cilantro

items.title: Medicinal Miso
items.description: Flavorful broth, bok choi, zucchini noodles, dried sesame mushrooms & nori

items.title: Cream of Mushroom
items.description: Champignon, portabello, shiitake and reishi soup. Add a multiseed cracker topped with papaya lox and pili nut cream cheese (+35k).

items.title: Asian "Chicken" Salad
items.description: Jackfruit "chicken", romaine, carrots & pickled ginger sprinkled with spring onion, cilantro, crispy sunflower noodles & tossed with creamy sesame ginger dressing

items.title: Alchemy Lover
items.description: Mixed greens, fresh herbs, fresh corn, pink sauerkraut, avocado, sprouted pumpkin seeds, crispy sesame onion & herb vinaigrette

items.title: Avocado Caesar
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with avocado, pili nut rawmesan, coconut bacon, capers & creamy Caesar dressing

items.title: Hallou&mi Salad with Beets
items.description: Seasoned chickpeas, roasted beets, mixed greens, capers, pili nut hallou&mi & pumpkin seeds with honey mustard dressing

items.title: Poke Bowl

items.title: Teriyaki Bowl

items.description: Tender smokey jackfruit patty stacked with homemade pickles, tomato, caramelized onion, lettuce, secret sauce & served with potato wedges

items.description: Sun dried tomato crust, marinara sauce, cashew cream cheeze, pineapple, peppers, olives, mushrooms & rocket

items.title: Pasta Primavera
